data.title: University And College Admission
data.meta_description: Prospectus GU - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides information about Gauhati University, the oldest university in Northeast India, including its mission to bring social, economic, moral, and spiritual upliftment to the people of Assam through education and research. It outlines the university's faculties and departments, academic programs, admission process, fees, and other administrative details. The Vice-Chancellor welcomes prospective students and provides an overview of the rewarding experience offered by Gauhati University.
